Movie Seat Booking Page

About this project

This is a Movie Seat Booking App in JavaScript without any frameworks or libraries. Users can pick a movie from the drop-down menu and pick their seats. The number of seats selected, and the total price will be shown on the bottom. Indexes of the seats, movie title, and price will be saved to the local storage, so those data stay on the page even after the reload.
